sections.heading: 01|Anatomical gift definitions
sections.text: Effective:April 7, 2009Latest Legislation:House Bill 529 - 127th General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDFAs used in sections2108.02to2108.35of the Revised Code:(A) "Adult" means an individual who is at least eighteen years of age.(B) "Agent" means an individual

sections.heading: the Revised  Code are enacted to adopt the  Revised Uniform Anatomical Gift Act  (2006), national conference of commissioners on uniform state  laws.
sections.text: the Revised Code are enacted to adopt the Revised Uniform Anatomical Gift Act (2006), national conference of commissioners on uniform state laws.
